---
title: TEKsystems Canada
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: teksystems_canada
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $79.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with TEKsystems Canada. The average
  contract duration was 1.45 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.2M. The longest
  contract was 6.77 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $32.2M.
lookup_name: 'TEKSYSTEMS CANADA'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '79.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '443'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '229'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '52%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '228%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '3.48'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '114.3M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.45'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.2M'
s425_max_duration: '6.77'
s422_max_contract_value: '32.2M'
---
